sentences.en: A safety alert system by DTMF ( Dual - tone multifrequency ) mode is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种采用DTMF ( Dual -ToneMultifreqency ) 信号方式通信的安全报警系统.

sentences.en: As for Ismail, he would be exposed to our dual - track system right at the source.
sentences.cn: 至于伊斯梅尔, 他将从根本上了解我们的 双轨 系统.

sentences.en: Do you suppose it is beyond us to produce a dual system of astronomy?
sentences.cn: 难道你以为我们不能创造一种双重的天文学体系 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has dual role as composer and conductor.
sentences.cn: 他兼作曲家及指挥的双重身分.

sentences.en: his dual role as composer and conductor
sentences.cn: 他兼任作曲家和指挥的双重角色

sentences.en: I see. And I've heard about dual exchange rate before.
sentences.cn: 我明白了. 我曾经还听说过双重汇率.

sentences.en: I would offer a caveat for those who want to join me in the dual calling.
sentences.cn: 为防止发生误解，我想对那些想要步我后尘的人提出警告。

sentences.en: Rob may be entitled to dual nationality.
sentences.cn: 罗布或许能拥有双重国籍。
这架飞机有两套操纵装置.

sentences.en: The delta - winged Columbia, before reaching the orbit, jettisoned its dual booster rockets two minutes into flight.
sentences.cn: 三角翼的哥伦比亚号航天飞机在进入轨道前, 起飞两分钟就抛下其两个助推火箭.

sentences.en: The leghaemoglobin surrounding the bacteroids serves a dual role.
sentences.cn: 类菌体四周的豆血红蛋白执行双重职能.

sentences.en: The reason for the discount is the use of dual - class shares.
sentences.cn: 存在折价率问题的原因是双重投票权股票(dual -classshares )的使用.

sentences.en: This dual tug is apparent in the whole movement of expatriation.
sentences.cn: 这种两面周旋的态度在整个寄居海外运动中极为明显.

sentences.en: This versatility comes from a dual weather influence.
sentences.cn: 这种多样性是由于双重的气候影响而形成的.

phrases.tran_cn: 双重系统，双系统；对偶系统
双声道；双轨政策（北约部署新武器和限武谈判双轨进行的政策）

trans.tran_en: having two of something or two parts
